name: Tank Factory
description:
Tip: Buy Blasts amount at the start to clear out the first waves easily.

WASD - Movement 

Mouse Click - Shoot

Middle Mouse/Space - Blast

Build tanks! - Build tanks from several upgrades.

Survive the harsh economy! - You are given limited resources to build tanks, use it wisely.

Think of every Tank build! - Should you buy more power? More rate of fire? By having information of every wave make the right build to win it.
